scripts.dev: echo 'No app yet. Add Next.js or your app framework'
scripts.secrets:check: bash -lc 'if git ls-files | grep -E "^\.env(\..*)?$"; then echo "Error: .env files must not be committed" >&2; exit 1; fi'
scripts.env:check: npm run env:validate && npm run env:health
scripts.check: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test && npm run secrets:check
scripts.pre-pr: npm run check && npm run build
